countertopsReplacement.template: Recognize and replace all countertop surfaces in the base kitchen image with photorealistic {stoneName} featuring {stoneDescription}. backsplashReplacement.description: Replace backsplash with matching slab (not tiles)
backsplashReplacement.template: Replace the backsplash in the base kitchen image with a seamless slab of matching {stoneName} with {stoneDescription}, extending from counter to cabinets. Avoid tiled look; make it a continuous polished surface. Preserve all other details, lighting, and perspective exactly as in the base image.

combinedReplacement.description: Replace both countertops and backsplash in one edit

Use a slab style for the backsplash, not tiles. Ensure seamless integration, photorealistic texture, and unchanged elements like cabinets, island base, appliances, window, and floor.

walkAroundVideo.description: Generate 8-second orbiting video at human eye level

Keep photorealistic style, natural window light, cabinets, appliances and all other details exactly as in the attached image. Smooth camera motion, no text or HUD.
